<h3 id="X39900">X(39900) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-YFF TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^6-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+(b^4+c^4-2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*b*c)*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39900) = 3*X(10056)-2*X(12588)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39900) lies on these lines: {1,6776}, {3,39873}, {5,39892}, {6,1479}, {11,5050}, {12,18440}, {35,69}, {36,25406}, {55,3564}, {182,499}, {193,4294}, {388,39874}, {495,39891}, {497,14912}, {498,1352}, {511,4302}, {542,10053}, {611,1478}, {613,8550}, {895,12896}, {1351,6284}, {1353,15171}, {1428,10072}, {1469,4299}, {1570,9664}, {3056,4309}, {3085,5921}, {3295,39897}, {3299,39875}, {3301,39876}, {3583,14853}, {3584,11180}, {3618,7741}, {3751,10572}, {4304,34379}, {5010,10519}, {5028,9598}, {5034,9599}, {5093,9668}, {5119,5847}, {5135,12586}, {5268,14826}, {5274,33748}, {5310,6515}, {5433,12017}, {5848,10058}, {7727,11061}, {10037,39879}, {10038,39882}, {10039,39885}, {10040,39887}, {10041,39888}, {10079,13354}, {10483,14927}, {10523,39889}, {10801,39872}, {10895,39884}, {10896,18583}, {10954,39890}, {11393,39588}, {11398,39871}, {11507,39877}, {11579,32297}, {11877,39880}, {11878,39881}, {11912,39886}, {11951,39895}, {11952,39896}, {12950,34779}, {12953,21850}, {13904,19145}, {13962,19146}, {15069,31452}, {15338,33878}, {16475,30384}, {19369,31670}, {22766,39883}, {23708,38049}, {24248,29307}, {35808,39894}, {35809,39893}</p>
<p>
X(39900) = midpoint of X(6776) and X(39902)<br>
X(39900) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1478, 611), (39891, 495)<br>
X(39900) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 6776, 39901), (182, 12589, 499), (1352, 2330, 498), (3295, 39899, 39897)<br>
</p>
